g.text: Psalm 3; all phrase-level glosses are drafts
moved מִפְּנֵי אַבְשָׁלוֹם בְּנ to adverbially modify ברח instead of adjectivally modifying the object of the preposition
substantival ptc w/ obj, like Ps 91:2
substantival ptc w/ obj, like Ps 91:2
separated contra previous diagram because there is no conjunction
separated contra previous diagram because no conjunction with previous clause
